Subject: New P.Os 0430 to 0447/24 - SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA
TextBody: Hello Bram, Please, see attached the JBS/Swift orders. @Françoise De Vrieze<mailto:Francoise.DeVrieze@agristo.com>, please, inform the SKU number for 1,5 Kg bags from Swift, so we can amend POs 433, 434, 438, 439, 440, 441, 444, 445, 446 and 447/24. Please find attached: * P.Os 0430 to 0447/24 - 19 x 40' fcl - FOB ANTUERPIA + ITAJAI, SC-BRASIL * Shipments on Q2 (April, May and June) Note that labels and tags must comply with the new labeling instruction and legislation. ANVISA RDC 429/2020 and IN 75/2020 Please send us PROFORMA INVOICE and LABELS/STICKER, for approval. It is very important that the description of the documents is the same as the product name in DIPOA. Please you must wait for I/L and have our authorization before shipment! Note below important details: * It's mandatory to place some cartons per item and per lot near the container door for inspection purposes. * If it's a container reefer, it's mandatory to have at least 1 thermographs (monitors SENSITECH), next to the container door. It must be programmed to register 120 days. * Send the shipping advice/report including information and photos of loading in order to check the condition of the goods and container before loaded. * Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. Please follow the below instructions for shipping documents: INVOICE / PROFORMA Imported by: SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA RUA BLUMENAU, 658 - 1º ANDAR BAIRRO SÃO JOÃO ITAJAÍ SC 88305-100 BRASIL CNPJ:02.914.460/0001-50 Sold to: SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA RUA BLUMENAU, 658 - 1º ANDAR BAIRRO SÃO JOÃO ITAJAÍ SC 88305-100 BRASIL CNPJ:02.914.460/0001-50 There is some mandatory information to be mentioned on INVOICE/PROFORMA: * Detailed Description of Goods in Portuguese and English: * Full Producer details: * Country of Origin, Shipment and Purchase: * Total Net Quantity: * Total Gross Quantity: * NCM code - only the 4 first digits * Payment Terms: 60 DD * Loading Port: ANTUERPIA * Unloading Port: ITAJAI, SC-BRASIL * Incoterm: FOB * Exporter Bank Details * Must be always stamped and signed by hand by AGRISTO N.V. * It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. Only to be added on INVOICE: * Production's date: DD/MM/YYYY * Expiry's date: DD/MM/YYYY * Lot Number: * If importer has a Purchase Order No. (reference no.) please include it. * Date of Invoice must be before or the same as date mentioned in the bill of landing; * It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. * The freight rates mentioned in Purchases Orders and Proformas are an estimated freight. In the original invoice, mention the freight exactly as it appears in the Bill of Landing. BILL OF LANDING - OBS: Report FREE-TIME and perdiem. Consignee: SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA RUA BLUMENAU, 658 - 1º ANDAR BAIRRO SÃO JOÃO ITAJAÍ SC 88305-100 BRASIL CNPJ:02.914.460/0001-50 Notify: SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA Av. Marginal Direita do Tietê, 500 - Bloco II 3º andar - Sala 1 Swift S342 - Vila Jaguara SÃO PAULO SP 05118-100 BRASIL CNPJ:02.914.460/0382-04 * NCM code - only the 4 first digits * Include CBM (m³) in the B/L. * On the fields Consignee and Notify, please DON'T use the sentence "TO THE ORDER OF". * It must inform the existence or not of wooden package. * Include the thermograph number in B/L. * Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. * Issue 3 set of B/L and one might be used for the bank, one might be used to send to the consignee, one might be kept with the shipper, for safety reasons, as it is not necessary to release the load. PACKING LIST Must be always stamped and signed by AGRISTO N.V. Importer: SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA RUA BLUMENAU, 658 - 1º ANDAR BAIRRO SÃO JOÃO ITAJAÍ SC 88305-100 BRASIL CNPJ:02.914.460/0001-50 Sold to: SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA RUA BLUMENAU, 658 - 1º ANDAR BAIRRO SÃO JOÃO ITAJAÍ SC 88305-100 BRASIL CNPJ:02.914.460/0001-50 CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN/ SANITARY / ANALYSIS / ANALYSIS MICROBIOLOGICAL / METAL CERTIFICATE / LOT DECLARATION + OTHER CERTIFICATES * Sanitary and Analysis - Always with the same date as BL, or before. * Phito: obligatory to mention scientific (botanical) name. THOSE DOCUMENTS MUST BE ISSUED ONLY IN NAME OF: SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA RUA BLUMENAU, 658 - 1º ANDAR BAIRRO SÃO JOÃO ITAJAÍ SC 88305-100 BRASIL CNPJ:02.914.460/0001-50 All documents must be sent to us by e-mail for approval, before sending the originals. Please do not issue any original without our approval. It is very important to send all originals of shipping documents before the arrival of the vessel, the originals must be on this side at least 5 days before ETA, in order to avoid unnecessary storage expenses and/or penalty fees due to delay of sending originals. Collection letter to the bank must be made in name of SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA RUA BLUMENAU, 658 - 1º ANDAR BAIRRO SÃO JOÃO ITAJAÍ SC 88305-100 BRASIL CNPJ:02.914.460/0001-50 Send to below bank address: SEARA ALIMENTOS LTDA Av. Marginal Direita do Tietê, 500 - Bloco II 3º andar - Sala 1 Swift S342 - Vila Jaguara SÃO PAULO SP 05118-100 BRASIL

Subject: Nobredo / 01133/23 / Documents
TextBody: Dear all, We pass it on to the importer. How does Agrist intend to resolve the issue, as the loads need another carrier? Let’s know Regards [cid:image001.jpg@01DA86E0.A1A62EF0] De: Service Request <service@agristo.com> Enviada em: quinta-feira, 4 de abril de 2024 11:06 Para: delta@jaoliveira.com.br Cc: thalita.delgado@hlag.com; distributionbrimp@hlag.com Assunto: RE: RES: RES: Nobredo / 01133/23 / Documents Dear all, I have received more info from our forwarder from Hapag Belguim. Nobredo is not blacklisted but is blocked and we have received below information: Q Kindly note that this analysis refers to SERASA (financial health rating), in order to safeguard the company in case the customer fails to meet its debts with Hapag. This way, we keep it locked. Remembering that this case does not refer to clients already with debts under lawyers with Hapag (Blacklist). Therefore, we are requesting that bookings from this client are not accepted and/or fees are prepaid, or the CNEE is changed. Follow below the SERASA Score Default. Translation: “The score represents that the company is already in default in the market. For this type of company, it is market practice to sell only in cash.” U

Subject: FW: VGM Weight Discrepancy Fee Alert SEGU9224926 - PO OF01617201
TextBody: Hi Jeroen Hope you are well. Simplot have been charged a fee by the local terminal operator due to a difference between the declared weight on the paperwork issued by Agristo and the actual weight of the container. Subject: DAGAB/ Agristo/ loading agreements
TextBody: Goedenavond Mercedes, Opnieuw hebben we problemen gehad met een verlading voor DAGAB. (deze keer shipment 9030088 / 81006654) Het terugkomende probleem: ze zijn overladen op de assen en willen helemaal opnieuw geladen worden. De persoon van deze lading vertelde ons zelf dat het de vorige keer ook zo was. Opnieuw is zij hier echter niet binnen geweest om te vragen anders te laden. Het enige dat ze had gevraagd was om 1 pallet (van de 3) die er al in stond, aan de deur te plaatsen. We hebben na veel weerwoord en telefoons, gekeken om haar te helpen met enkele paletten te verplaatsen. Op de kade aangekomen begon ze echter dat er meerdere moesten worden verplaatst, dat dit niets van verschil ging maken. Hetgeen ze wilde was volledig herladen. Haar dit dan ook duidelijk gemaakt dat dit niet zal gebeuren. De steunpilaartjes die ze meehad zouden ook nooit het gewicht kunnen tegenhouden indien ze kort zou moeten remmen. Ze bleef verder discussiëren, tot het agressieve toe. Duidelijk geantwoord dat wij geen fout hebben hierin. Wij laden zoals wordt opgedragen, we nog wilden helpen maar ze zelf duidelijk maakte dat dit geen verschil maakte. Ik heb de discussie toen beëindigd, en opdracht gegeven van niets te verladen en de poort te sluiten. Ze moest dit verder discussiëren met haar chef, en niet bij ons. Wij hebben ons werk gedaan zoals hoort en wilden nog verder helpen, wat echt ook niet in dank werd genomen. Dan verspil ik hier geen energie meer aan. Gelieve eens in communicatie te gaan met DAGAB en zijn transporteurs. Deze problemen blijven zich telkens herhalen, wat veel energie en tijd vraagt van onze medewerkers. Telkenmale er terug zo’n situatie voorvalt, zal ik dit in mail naar u versturen, zodat u begrijpt dat dit een steeds terugkomend probleem blijft. Mvg Femke Femke​​​​ Zephirin Ploegchef Logistiek Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com <https://eu.content.exclaimer.net?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1> <https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&excomponentid=0FtwO6H728rcYRqVjUeXx_KJWv-RPvCRW1zd8woKpSo&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1>

Subject: Agristo 308 Purchase Order
TextBody: Hi Beau, Ok en heb je daar de prijs van aub? mvg, Elynn Marisse Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 472 922 248 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Beau Declerck [beau.declerck@agristo.com] Sent: 4/04/2024 19:26 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: FW: Agristo 308 Purchase Order Hey Elynn, Die ene pallet BJ10 is niet onder Eurogold (want dit is specifiek voor Korea). Ze hebben het Crrrock’n artikel nodig: 313119 Dus je zal dit ergens moeten toevoegen op een volgend order van Lydford. Want ze hebben die ene pallet nog nodig. Thx! Beau​​​​ Declerck Key Account Manager T +32 56 54 09 68 • M +32 479 21 12 12 Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com From: Lydford Logistics <logistics@lydfordfoods.com> Sent: woensdag 3 april 2024 23:52 To: Agristo Salesforce service <service@agristo.com> Cc: David Phillips <dgphillips@lydfordfoods.com>; Simone Phillips <sphillips@lydfordfoods.com>; Beau Declerck <Beau.Declerck@agristo.com> Subject: RE: FW: Agristo 308 Purchase Order Importance: High Hi Elynn, good morning😊 We would appreciate it if you reduced the Lydford Farms fries on the mix container by 1 pallet to accommodate 1 pallet of the Maestro Steakhouse Fries item number 307368 for this shipment. I have attached our revised purchase order # 1806, representing Agristo 308, which is schedule to sail onboard the vessel, CMA-CGM Fort Charles, Thursday April 11th , 2024, and arrive in Kingston, Jamaica on Monday April 29th , 2024 , to reflect the changes. We would appreciate if you would send us your revised order confirmation, confirming shipping details, also, a draft copy or copies, of the EUR.1 Certificates for our review, at your earliest convenience. Just a reminder to remove any mention of Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

Subject: NOTIFICATION *URGENT ALERT* Listeria suspect*
TextBody: Hi Rob, in bijlage de analyses van Kafuzan. Ik interpreteer als onder 25g, onder die waarden valt niet nauwer te bepalen? Of kan ik de klant nog challengen voor een meer nauwkeurige waarde? Wouter Claerhout Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Forwarded Message --------------- From: Shani [shani@kafuzan.co.il] Sent: 28/03/2024 10:22 To: service@agristo.com Cc: marieke.seynaeve@agristo.com; evelyn.declercq@agristo.com; pieter.devriendt@agristo.com; yaniv@kafuzan.co.il; avishay@kafuzan.co.il Subject: RE: NOTIFICATION *URGENT ALERT* Listeria suspect* Hi Wouter, See attached.

Subject: FW: Re: Agristo/ Cypruz Froz/ 1st order FROZorder01
TextBody: Good day, I informed internally and a colleague, Françoise, from a collaborating department will help you further :) She will send you the requested information (image of the foil) for the articles. As you cannot proceed yet with the prepayment (and loading) before everything is settled, I postponed the first order again to 15/04.

Subject: RE: BOEKBEV. FCL EN_BEMPL24015637_2024-04-02_16-57-34.docx - DICPO009173 ( Jakarta , Indonesia )
TextBody: Dear Tracy, Linda, On the 23rd of April it will not be possible to load in Wielsbeke from 8 until 14hrs due to preparations for a new “EWN system”. Loading is PO DICPO009173 is planned on 23/04 at 8 AM in the morning. Is there a possibility to bring this loading forward to the 22nd of april or to postone this loading to 24/04? Please note that in this case, the inspection will have to be rescheduled as well.

TextBody: Dear Celina, We have registered your complaint in our system and have passed the data to our logistics department. Our loading staff will be updated and addressed accordingly. Attached you may find the credit note and debit note related to the mixed articles.

Subject: FHA - FOOD & BEVERAGE ASIA Data List
TextBody: Hi, I Hope you are doing well !! We are following up to confirm if you are interested in acquiring the Visitors/Attendees List. Events Name: FHA - FOOD & BEVERAGE ASIA 2024 Date: April 23 - 26, 2024 Location: Singapore (Singapore) Counts: 21,534 If you are interested in acquiring the list, we can Send you the Discounted cost and additional details. Each record of the list contains: Contact Name, Email Address, Company Name, URL/Website, Phone No, Title/Designation. We are looking forward to hearing from you. Thanks &

Subject: Mercadona: Cajas chafadas prov 349945 Agristo - 61421 PATATA PREFRITA FINA

Subject: 【IMPORTANT】 TOYOTA COMPLAINT FOR 3CM METAL PIECE WAS FOUND IN SHOESTRING
TextBody: Hi Jeroen en joke Pieter had mij gevraagd om de rapporten van Japan betreffende deze klacht naar jullie door te sturen. In bijlage de rapporten + de vertalingen (gelukkig! 😉) Wat zijn jullie bevindingen? Ik heb het stukje ondertussen ook mogen ontvangen, is iemand van jullie vandaag nog in WB? Hoe wensen jullie deze ontvangen zodat jullie even op de lijn kunnen testen als het wordt uitgeworpen. Kunnen jullie even voor mij onderstaande vragen beantwoorden dan speel ik het door naar de klant. Gaat over excel checks metal detector Q1 What does the mean Treshhold and value 400 ? Is this the value that we set at metal detector and value goes up when product with metal pass though metal detector correct ? Q3 Can you pls explain meaning of number of bags rejected to QC and 0 in value ? Is this all bags with different test pieces had been perfectly detected at the test ? Bedankt Michelle​​​​ Bevernage Technical Sales Officer T +32 56 54 09 65 <tel:+32%2056%2054%2009%2065> • M +32 496 38 91 92 <tel:+32%20496%2038%2091%2092> Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com <https://eu.content.exclaimer.net?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=ca3f3a69c6edee11aaf0000d3aaa3768&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1> <https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fagristo.com%2Fconcepts%2Fconscious-clean-vegan%3Futm_source%3Dsignature%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_campaign%3Dclean_vegan&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=ca3f3a69c6edee11aaf0000d3aaa3768&excomponentid=LSqV1Xfj79LTWpGX2j26BkH5yCTIx1WIUwjxhL0ib7s&signature=qP0t-T7Lgrqasi3JC39a52O-FY0rkPeItRZ0Vpf5VcfX4dNnS_s1SK99WKMz1bPumVrJKDzp6JEH6Cvon99Yt9GzuEpgjVfNHXskL1pBL6-qqlW8TDpQyKipn-Blro1shz_qxSv0Pa8iSLMdebxJeCqRIPnejkOZPE8LQhShdQ8b58hg4_K_QLrev-rcS1cHza0TnTVaftYi4lzPjT2ewWf0EC182gm6lG89afRz3JPhhsqbkzFZiLTSS75hp0gtkkR1Ojm_Y30-rfQVTLWqZ8BgyxFjS5WNYSb_G6npu87nioOgPMS8BvVSQwJddDpG4ehHma-EOyqFObhE_XRH2A&v=1>

Subject: Agristo 308 Purchase Order
TextBody: Hi Beau, Ik heb die ene pallet al kunnen toevoegen aan het order dat maandag moet laden er is stock. Dus ik ga die mixed container dan laden met 1 pal minder van hun Lydford farms. Ik zal hen nieuwe PF bezorgen zodra ik van jou de prijs krijg. Mvg, Elynn Marisse Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 472 922 248 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Service Request [service@agristo.com] Sent: 5/04/2024 09:59 To: beau.declerck@agristo.com Subject: RE: FW: Agristo 308 Purchase Order Hi Beau, Ok en heb je daar de prijs van aub? mvg, Elynn Marisse Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 472 922 248 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Beau Declerck [beau.declerck@agristo.com] Sent: 4/04/2024 19:26 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: FW: Agristo 308 Purchase Order Hey Elynn, Die ene pallet BJ10 is niet onder Eurogold (want dit is specifiek voor Korea). Ze hebben het Crrrock’n artikel nodig: 313119 Dus je zal dit ergens moeten toevoegen op een volgend order van Lydford. Want ze hebben die ene pallet nog nodig. Thx! Beau​​​​ Declerck Key Account Manager T +32 56 54 09 68 • M +32 479 21 12 12 Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com From: Lydford Logistics <logistics@lydfordfoods.com> Sent: woensdag 3 april 2024 23:52 To: Agristo Salesforce service <service@agristo.com> Cc: David Phillips <dgphillips@lydfordfoods.com>; Simone Phillips <sphillips@lydfordfoods.com>; Beau Declerck <Beau.Declerck@agristo.com> Subject: RE: FW: Agristo 308 Purchase Order Importance: High Hi Elynn, good morning😊 We would appreciate it if you reduced the Lydford Farms fries on the mix container by 1 pallet to accommodate 1 pallet of the Maestro Steakhouse Fries item number 307368 for this shipment. I have attached our revised purchase order # 1806, representing Agristo 308, which is schedule to sail onboard the vessel, CMA-CGM Fort Charles, Thursday April 11th , 2024, and arrive in Kingston, Jamaica on Monday April 29th , 2024 , to reflect the changes. We would appreciate if you would send us your revised order confirmation, confirming shipping details, also, a draft copy or copies, of the EUR.1 Certificates for our review, at your earliest convenience. Just a reminder to remove any mention of Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

Subject: COMPLAINT  Ref:BX138994
TextBody: Our Reference BX138994 Please quote the above reference on all correspondence 5th April 2024 Agristo N V Fao Richard Storer Old Mill Place High Street Tattenhall Chester CH3 9PX FOR THE ATTENTION OF Marlies OWN LABEL PRODUCT COMPLAINT - Chefs Larder Premium Supercrisp Skin On Fries 4 x 2.5kg BATCH CODE INFORMATION - G3224077 14.3.26 COMPLAINT DETAIL - coating coming off in oil - photo to follow One of our customers has had reason to contact us regarding the above mentioned complaint. The sample relating to this complaint is being held at branch Should you need to contact the Booker branch, Greenock 177 - Tel 01475 729618, please ensure you quote the reference C177-823. We will require written acknowledgement from yourselves within 10 working days, assuring us that this matter has been received and logged for your records. Please forward your acknowledgement by Email to customer.relations@booker.co.uk or alternatively by post to Booker Cash & Carry Ltd, Equity House, Irthlingborough Road, Wellingborough, NN8 1LT. Please note This notification attracts an administration charge of £2.75 plus the customer reimbursement cost of £14.99. These charges are in accordance with our current deals and charges, linked to your trading terms. This will be invoiced at the end of our next financial period. Should you have any queries regarding the above please do not hesitate to contact me. Yours sincerely Sam Mccalla Customer Relations Tel 01933 371793 This is a confidential email intended only for the person it is addressed to. Booker may monitor and record all emails. The views expressed in this email are those of the sender and not Booker. Internet communications are not secure and therefore we do not accept legal responsibility for the contents of this message. Subject: Booth Design and Construction Services - SIAL Expo 2024, Paris.
TextBody: Dear Madam / Sir, Our company is specialized in the design and building of custom exhibition stands. We would be very pleased to discuss possible proposals to accompany the presence of your company at SIAL Expo 2024 exhibition in Paris. Attached you will find the presentation of our company. Also you can find us at www.exponymo.com<http://www.exponymo.com/> If you are interested please send me an email with all information needed to elaborate your stand project and we will send you our proposal with the cost. If you already have the designs you can send it to us for costing. I remain at your disposal for anything you want and hope to have news from you soon.

Subject: Sanitary registration
TextBody: Goedemorgen Felien, We kregen deze mail van Damon. De free sales is destijds opgesteld en naar hen doorgestuurd voor onderstaande artikels en hiermee heeft Damon zijn sanitaire registrering in Guatemala aangepast en dus ook een register nr gekregen. Ik weet nu niet of dit op verpakking en/of labels vermeld moet worden, maar vermoed van wel aangezien hij zo vriendelijk is om de documenten door te sturen. Koppel jij eventueel naar de klant terug met service (en jessie) in cc? Dan weten we ook dat je het bekeken hebt en zijn we ook op de hoogte of er een aanpassing plaats vindt. Miscchien moeten we de klant dan ook vragen of we hem moeten verwittigen vanaf wanneer er stock met nieuwe labels,... geladen wordt of er misschien al vroeger aanpassingen nodig zijn op orders (en oude stock wel of niet nog gebruikt kan worden)? Mvg, Mercedes D'hoker Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 63 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Emilio Santano [esantano@damonint.com] Sent: 5/04/2024 01:20 To: Mercedes.Dhoker@agristo.com Cc: Jessie.Dhondt@agristo.com Subject: New Sanitary Permits Hello Mercedes, Hope you’re doing well. Please find attached the new Sanitary Registrations. Should there be anything else you need do not hesitate to let me know.

Subject: Par preču daudzumu akcijas piedāvājumu laikā / On the quantity of goods for the promotional period
TextBody: Šī vēstule tiek nosūtīta automātiski God. Sadarbības partneri! Ar mērķi sekmēt sadarbību un atvieglot Jūsu piegādājamo preču daudzumu plānošanu, SIA „Rimi Latvia”, saņemot akcijas piedāvājumu, sniedz Jums provizorisku informāciju par nepieciešamo preču daudzumu tirdzniecības veicināšanas akciju laikā. Vēršam Jūsu uzmanību uz to, ka augstākminētajai informācijai ir rekomendējošs raksturs, SIA „Rimi Latvia” nav pienākums iegādāties visus plānotos daudzumus, kas norādīti pielikumā. Paskaidrojam, ka faktiskā preču pasūtīšana un piegāde arī turpmāk notiks tikai pamatojoties uz Pirkuma līguma noteikumiem. >>>>> VĒLAMIES ATGĀDINĀT, KA AKCIJAS PROGNOŽU NOSŪTĪŠANA ESOŠAJĀ FORMĀTĀ DRĪZUMĀ TIKS PĀRTRAUKTA. LAI TURPINĀTU SAŅEMT AKCIJAS PROGNOZES, AICINĀM IZMANTOT iRIMI portālu (https://irimi.rimibaltic.com/) <<<<< SIA „Rimi Latvia” Piegādes tīkls un loģistika ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- This letter has been sent automatically Dear cooperation partner! With the purpose to promote cooperation and facilitate planing quantities of goods, SIA Rimi Latvia, upon receipt of the promotional campaign proposal, will provide you with provisional information on the required quantities of goods during promotional campaign. We would like to draw your attention to the fact that the foregoing information is of permissive nature. SIA Rimi Latvia has no obligation to purchase all projected quantities stated in the schedule. Please be informed that all future actual ordering and delivery of goods will also be based only on the provisions of the Purchase Agreement. >>>>> WE WOULD LIKE TO REMINDER THAT THE SENDING OF PROMOTION FORECASTS IN THE CURRENT FORMAT SOON WILL BE DISCONTINUED. WE INVITE YOU TO USE THE iRIMI PORTAL (https://irimi.rimibaltic.com/) TO CONTINUE RECEIVING PROMOTION FORECASTS <<<<< SIA „Rimi Latvia” Supply Chain & Logistic PRIVACY NOTICE: Your privacy is important for us at RIMI. We are transparent with how we collect and process any personal data that you share with us. More detailed information on how we process your personal data can be found at Privacy section in RIMI’s home page. Subject: FW: BILLA Süßkartoffel Pommes
TextBody: Dear, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 19588. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : G24231442043 Production day : 24/05/2023 Please let me explain that all incoming potatoes are inspected for quality and defects. Afterwards, the peeled potatoes pass an optical sorter. A second very sophisticated optical sorter is in place after the potatoes are cut, which also removes black spots from the potato pieces. In addition, every hour the packaged product is sampled and tested for quality, including blemishes, peel, green. QC documents of these records are retained. Based on the lotcode, we have conducted a thorough investigation into our production records and quality documents for this specific batch. No remarks were found during these checks. It's important to note that there will always be variations in production throughout the year due to the inherent nature of potatoes as a natural product. From a technical standpoint, we always strive to offer you the best possible product. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

for this shipment. I have attached our revised purchase order # 1806, representing Agristo 308, which is schedule to sail onboard the vessel, CMA-CGM Fort Charles, Thursday April 11th , 2024, and arrive in Kingston, Jamaica on Monday April 29th , 2024 , to reflect the changes. We would appreciate if you would send us your revised order confirmation, confirming shipping details, also, a draft copy or copies, of the EUR.1 Certificates for our review, at your earliest convenience. Just a reminder to remove any mention of Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

And check with the inspection agency to reschedule the inspection.

Dear Maxime, Product quantity per container is depending per product / per packaging. We requested the same packaging for all the products 4x2x5kg, so we need to know: Box by pallet How many pallets you embark by container of 40.' My offered prices so far were always FCA, you are talking about FOB as well I see. It is ok for us; we can manage as soon as you tell us about the port for shipment. Prices for sure cannot be offered until September, prices change monthly, and currently they keep increasing. We need confirmation from your behalf that you can maintain the price for 5x40' that we need to embark ASAP, so once you send to us a confirmation about price, availability, samples and documents for register, and issue and invoice, we can launch this first shipment, that could be an monthly supply. Payment method for first shipment is always prepayment. We are ok with that as soon as you issue an invoice with the total quantity that you can offer us according to our request: 5x40'RF Documentation needs to be checked. Labeling adapted to languages needs to be customized. We are ok with that but also, but can we work on confirming the order with the issuance of the proforma invoice? About which generic packaging are we talking about? [cid:image002.png@01DA874D.902EF900] 4x2x5kg We would like to discuss this topic with the international sales manager since this may be a long-term business alliance. Awaiting your comments.

Subject: Referenz #GeVo2003427410: Issue: 2003426104, [ Beschwerde ] GUT&GÜNSTIG, GUT&GÜNSTIG Backofen Frites Wellenschnitt 1000g, Agristo NV2.2026, A04 24044 01:46
TextBody: Dear , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention, we have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 19564. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : A04240440146 Production day : 11/02/2026 There is a complete Quality Assurance system in place and the principles of HACCP are applied. This includes a full monitoring system on the production line. The finished products themselves are sampled every 60 minutes and examined for quality, including texture. Full records of these and all the other checks are maintained. There were no anomalies found in this batch. Also our cooking instructions are always based on a cooking validation. Based on the above we conclude this is an isolated case. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again. Michelle Bevernage Technical Sales Officer P +32 496 38 91 92 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: Mercadona: Cajas chafadas prov 349945 Agristo - 61421 PATATA PREFRITA FINA
TextBody: Good morning Ricardo, As explained face to face while you were visiting last friday, we adapted the height of the box for the 61421 PATATA PREFRITA FINA (to 240cm). This is the smallest box and should cause less free space between the top bag and the box itself, so less risk for the box to get crushed. A new production of the 61421 PATATA PREFRITA FINA started 03/04 and ended yesterday. All of the pallets were made with boxes of 240 cm. Should you want to follow up on when/ on which orders these boxes are loaded, I can give you the following information: 2 batches for a total of 158 pallets - Should you want the complete list, with the lotcodes of each pallet, just let me know. - 1402130732: production date 03/04/2024 - BBD 04/2026 - 1402130733: production date 03/04/2024 - BBD 04/2026 Currrently we still have 227 pallets of the last production of March in stock. (so together with the production of april, we come to a total of 385 pallets) the amount you need for open orders that still need to be loaded: 72 pallets. I hope this helps to follow up as of when the stock of production in April will be loaded, shoud you want to know this. Hoping to have informed you sufficiently. Should you need our assistance with anything else, do not hesitate to contact us.

Subject: TOYOTA COMPLAINT FOR FOREIGN BODIES LOOKS PRODUCT / STARCH CLUMPS
TextBody: Hi Hagino, It is indeed correct that we have an optical sorter before the item is packed. For the moment there is still a margin of error, which means that sometimes the clump is not regarded as foreign material, because the color does not differ much. We are aware of this issue and currently there is a project on resolving this issue. We are working on ensuring that the machine recognizes the foreign material as clump due to the fact that the composition (dry matter) differs from a potato. This is currently still a work in progress. We would like to assure you once again that we always do everything we can to provide you with a product of the best quality. KR [cid:image001.png@01DA875A.788576F0] Michelle​​​​ Bevernage Technical Sales Officer T +32 56 54 09 65<tel:+32%2056%2054%2009%2065> • M +32 496 38 91 92<tel:+32%20496%2038%2091%2092> Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com<https://eu.content.exclaimer.net?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=ca3f3a69c6edee11aaf0000d3aaa3768&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1> [Discover our clean and vegan products!]<https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fagristo.com%2Fconcepts%2Fconscious-clean-vegan%3Futm_source%3Dsignature%26utm_medium%3Demail%26utm_campaign%3Dclean_vegan&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=ca3f3a69c6edee11aaf0000d3aaa3768&excomponentid=LSqV1Xfj79LTWpGX2j26BkH5yCTIx1WIUwjxhL0ib7s&signature=qP0t-T7Lgrqasi3JC39a52O-FY0rkPeItRZ0Vpf5VcfX4dNnS_s1SK99WKMz1bPumVrJKDzp6JEH6Cvon99Yt9GzuEpgjVfNHXskL1pBL6-qqlW8TDpQyKipn-Blro1shz_qxSv0Pa8iSLMdebxJeCqRIPnejkOZPE8LQhShdQ8b58hg4_K_QLrev-rcS1cHza0TnTVaftYi4lzPjT2ewWf0EC182gm6lG89afRz3JPhhsqbkzFZiLTSS75hp0gtkkR1Ojm_Y30-rfQVTLWqZ8BgyxFjS5WNYSb_G6npu87nioOgPMS8BvVSQwJddDpG4ehHma-EOyqFObhE_XRH2A&v=1>

Nobredo is not blacklisted but is blocked and we have received below information: Q Kindly note that this analysis refers to SERASA (financial health rating), in order to safeguard the company in case the customer fails to meet its debts with Hapag. This way, we keep it locked. Remembering that this case does not refer to clients already with debts under lawyers with Hapag (Blacklist). Therefore, we are requesting that bookings from this client are not accepted and/or fees are prepaid, or the CNEE is changed. Follow below the SERASA Score Default. Translation: “The score represents that the company is already in default in the market. For this type of company, it is market practice to sell only in cash.” U

TextBody: Hi Kerry-Ann, Beau informed me that you would like to load asap 1 pallet of Battered Straight Cut skin on fries. I have added this pallet our item number 313119 (72 cartons per pallet) in order Agristo 308 and reduced the mixed container with 1 pallet of Lydford farm fries. This is Crrrock'en reference and not Eurogold to be clear. Amended pro forma invoice enclosed.

Subject: Agristo/ Auchan/ EDI setup Stef - commande example
TextBody: Bonjour, J'ai reçue vos données de Mme Delobel d'Auchan. Pour mettre tout correcte dans notre système et être certain de bien et correctement pouvoir recevoir vos commandes, on aimerait vous demander d'envoyer une commande teste par EDI ou un format txt. Pourriez-vous nous envoyer une commande teste, pour Strassbourg Surgelé - STEF VENDENHEIM? et livraison pour STEF VENDEHEIM CHEZ AUCHAN 12 alléé de l'Eco Parc Rhénan 67550 VENDENHEIM? Veuillez bien nous avertir quand vous l'avez envoyée. Nous vous remercions d'avance. Cordialement, Mercedes D'hoker Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 63

Dear Liseet Mata Product quantity per container is depending per product / per packaging. My offered prices so far were always FCA, you are talking about FOB aswell I see. Prices for sure can not be offered until september, prices change monthly, and currently they keep increasing. Documentation needs to be checked. Labeling adapted to languages needs to be customized. Payment method for first shipment is always prepayment. About which generic packaging are we talking about? As you see, still some things we need to discuss and agree upon. Looking forward hearing your respons.

Subject: FED24216
TextBody: Dag Elynn We zullen als volgt moeten doen: Laden op maandag 15/04. Kan je aub terug open zetten voor Mareco. Het komt wel echt heel slecht uit want deze afvaart is nog eens met 11 dagen extra. Dat komt neer op een totale vertraging van 18 dagen. JLD [image001.png] [Handtekening_JeanLouisDemuynck.png] On 5 Apr 2024, at 13:41, Jean-Louis Demuynck | Fedeco <jeanlouis.demuynck@fedeco.eu> wrote: Dag Elynn De boot komt sneller toe … 8/4 is laatste dag om te laden. Ik denk dat we een week gaan moeten opschuiven… hou u op de hoogte. JLD <Handtekening_JeanLouisDemuynck.png> On 5 Apr 2024, at 12:51, Service Request <service@agristo.com> wrote: Hi allen, We zullen dit order een dag later moeten laden. Productierun is verlaat naar 8/4 en we ontbreken nog 10 pallets voor dit order. Idealiter zou laden 10/4 nog beter zijn mochten er dit weekend nog eventuele vertragingen zijn. Kunnen jullie even bekijken met jullie transporteur of het mogelijk zou zijn om 9/4 late namiddag of nog beter 10/4 te laden? Mvg, [image] Elynn Marisse Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 472 922 248 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Service Request [service@agristo.com] Sent: 11/03/2024 14:25 To: jeanlouis.demuynck@fedeco.eu Cc: logistics@fedeco.eu; shipping@fedeco.eu Subject: Re: FED24216 Hi Jean-Louis, Het order werd geregistreerd in ons systeem. Orderbevestiging in bijlage. We kunnen laden in week 14. Mvg, [image] Elynn Marisse Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 472 922 248 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Service Request [service@agristo.com] Sent: 11/03/2024 13:58 To: jeanlouis.demuynck@fedeco.eu Cc: shipping@fedeco.eu; logistics@fedeco.eu Subject: Re: FED24216 Goeie namiddag Jean-Louis, Bestelling goed ontvangen. Ik maak de nieuwe ship to aan en bezorg je zo meteen de orderbevestiging en mogelijke laaddatum. Subject: Food Shows in Africa
TextBody: [https://exportdir.com/strip.jpg] INVITATION TRADE SHOWS IN AFRICA NEW MARKETS - NEW OPPORTUNITIES PROMOTE YOUR BUSINESS IN EAST AFRICA Sir/Madam, Wish you a pleasant Day ahead & Warm Greetings. BOOK YOUR STAND TODAY AN EXCELLENT OPPORTUNITY TO DISPLAY YOUR PRODUCTS & GET NEW BUYERS. It is our great pleasure to invite your esteemed organization to participate at the forthcoming international trade Shows to be held in Rwanda, Kenya, Uganda & Ethiopia. Below is the list of our upcoming 4 Trade Shows for your kind perusal. Kindly select the Trade Show and we will provide you the complete information accordingly. 1 RWANDA TRADE FAIR 1 - 5 AUGUST 2024, KIGALI - RWANDA Int'l Trade Show on all kind of General, FMCG, Consumer & Industrial Products 2 KENYA FOOD EXPO 01 - 03 SEPTEMBER 2024, NAIROBI - KENYA Int'l Trade Show on all kind of Food, Beverage, Agriculture, Energy Drinks, Can Food, Irrigation, Water Systems & Purification, Raw Materials, Kitchen & Hotel Equipment, Dairy Products, Catering, FMCG Products & Machinery 3 UGANDA FOOD EXPO 24 - 26 SEPTEMBER 2024, KAMPALA - UGANDA Int'l Trade Show on all kind of Food, Beverage, Agriculture, Energy Drinks, Can Food, Irrigation, Water Systems & Purification, Raw Materials, Kitchen & Hotel Equipment, Dairy Products, Catering, FMCG Products & Machinery 4 ETHIOPIA FOOD EXPO 26 - 28 OCTOBER 2024, ADDIS ABABA - ETHIOPIA Int'l Trade Show on all kind of Food, Beverage, Agriculture, Energy Drinks, Can Food, Irrigation, Water Systems & Purification, Raw Materials, Kitchen & Hotel Equipment, Dairy Products, Catering, FMCG Products & Machinery We have arranged several economical Packages for our international participants which includes Modern shell stand with basic furniture, 5* & 4* Hotel Accommodation, Meet & Assist service on arrival, Visa Invitation, Press and Media Coverage, Useful data of major companies enable you to invite them on your stand, Stand decoration, Cargo & shipping facilities, Market & City Tours, Transportation, Interpreter etc. KINDLY SELECT THE SHOW OF YOUR INTEREST & WE WILL PROVIDE YOU COMPLETE DETAILS. ( ) RWANDA TRADE FAIR ( ) KENYA FOOD EXPO ( ) UGANDA FOOD EXPO ( ) ETHIOPIA FOOD EXPO Kindly fill below form with complete details in capital letters & email back to us. CONTACT PERSON :- POSITION :- COMPANY :- ADDRESS :- TEL :- MOBILE :- E-MAIL (1) :- E-MAIL (2) :- WEBSITE :- PRODUCTS :- For further information on any above mentioned trade Shows, kindly email us or feel free to contact me on mobile +97155 - 5506187. We wish you the very best in your business and look forward to receive your kind support & positive reply. Thanks &

Subject: RE: Certificado de plásticos - Delegaciones
TextBody: Buenas tardes, Para evitar el trabajo manual adicional que Elynn en ese momente debe hacer para cada carga, querríamos verificar alugnas cosas: * Aun hace falta el certificado adicional? * Si leo todo de nuevo, era necesario sobre todo para el plástico reciclado, no parece necesario para el plástico no reciclado. Estoy correcta? Como nosotros solo temenos plástico NO reciclado, se podría omitier el certificado adicional? * En ese momento la cantidad de plastico esta mencionada en cada albarán y factura (y no está firmado) * Si me equivoco y el certificado adicional es necesario, podríamos hacer 1 certificado por cliente por año? * Si aun necesita el certificado, tiene que ser firmado? (solo veo en el boletin algo sobre la firma para plasticos reciclados, no para platico no recilado) Un saludo cordial, Mercedes​​​​ D'hoker Customer Service Specialist T +32 56 54 11 63 <tel:+32%2056%2054%2011%2063> • M +32 498 16 52 48 <tel:+32%20498%2016%2052%2048> Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com <https://eu.content.exclaimer.net?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1> <https://eu.content.exclaimer.net/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.agristo.com%2F&tenantid=R5mU58TWEe6F-gAiSH-K5g&templateid=443634af22d2ee1185fa0022487f8ae6&excomponentid=0FtwO6H728rcYRqVjUeXx_KJWv-RPvCRW1zd8woKpSo&signature=iFzMwqF297Gnrm9dssB9y6ZrUX6ui-gbIW3mmKrmZFU0fKOdCY7CBRtJiGe_Spn4dNtCSo7Dz3SqIjt40FOTSKqvA4CSyfr_2rdEcKiywYfk52eQDa3TP0yee1aLPqWhlT2-VWyiSjlwfPeFC2XwjArwx6eH8DXqSxKsPDk9zRTDisnzduRzC5ojXNfUDKcsXK30zIlw0nO2bRD_7benWToceZV3s_7YbFbU3vGih3dwe7J_ewazTQT4GtDl-pg3BF4NpNhrrDUxkkXgyyy9lKCK6ZoEagBoNlU-jxW4a96QCUEXG9ZPC0VjWmDRcOTQgLwZs2UYlVAA1eRt3wY-fw&v=1>

Subject: Re: Frieten export
TextBody: Dag Emiel, Graag zou ik 13 paletten friet 9MM willen bestellen. Kan u mij de proforma doorsturen. Groet, Rachid Op 4 apr 2024, om 14:36 heeft Rachid | Etnodis <rachid@etnodis.com> het volgende geschreven: Hi Emiel, Nieuws over Marokko? Nogal dringend Groet Rachid Op 2 apr 2024, om 09:19 heeft Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> het volgende geschreven: Dag Rachid, Op vlak van België kan ik u verder helpen. Voor Marokko zal ik mijn collega nog eens contacteren, aangezien ik hier nog geen antwoord op heb gehad. In België kunnen wij u onze Maestro brand aanbieden, product catalogus is te vinden in bijlage. Daar ligt de prijs voor de gewone 10x10 friet momenteel op 1,20€ per kg. Ik kijk uit naar uw feedback. Vriendelijke groeten, Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Rachid | Etnodis [rachid@etnodis.com] Sent: 29/03/2024 12:48 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: Frieten export Dag Emiel, Producten zullen vooral gaan over frieten 9mm - 10mm misschien lager. Klassieke friet en mogelijk ook gecoate. En de klassieke kroketten. Dat zijn de producten waar we focus op leggen. 1000ton waarvan 20% in belgie zal verkocht worden. 80% export. Kan je misschien wat druk zetten intern voor een bestelling te kunnen maken ;) Groet, Rachid Op 26 mrt 2024, om 16:31 heeft Agristo Sales <Sales@agristo.com> het volgende geschreven: Dag Rachid, ik heb ondertussen alweer antwoord gehad voor België, ze zouden graag weten welke artikelen u exact naar opzoek bent (De gewone friet, battered friet, kroket,... ). Met deze informatie plus de verwachte volumes zal ik u een brand kunnen aanbieden en kunnen we ook direct overgaan tot een order. Vriendelijke groeten, Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Sales [sales@agristo.com] Sent: 26/03/2024 16:26 To: rachid@etnodis.com Subject: Re: Frieten export Dag Rachid, Er zijn momenteel nieuwe richtlijnen in aankomst over welke labels we al dan niet mogen aanbieden in België. Ik heb alle informatie doorgestuurd naar de persoon die hiervoor verantwoordelijk is zodat ik de u de juiste informatie kan doorspelen. Het spijt mij voor het vele wachten. Zou het mogelijk zijn om mij ondertussen zicht te geven op wat de verwachte volumes zouden zijn in België en welke deze zouden zijn in Marokko over de periode van 1 jaar? Alvast bedankt voor uw geduld. Vriendelijke groeten, Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Rachid | Etnodis [rachid@etnodis.com] Sent: 26/03/2024 14:14 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: Frieten export Dag Emiel, Het is sowieso voor het noorden van Marokko, vandaag zijn jullie daar niet actief, anders zouden we het gezien hebben. We hebben de frieten ook nodig voor de etnische markt hier in belgie. Moeten we daar ook op wachten dan? Groet, Rachid Op 26 mrt 2024, om 14:00 heeft Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> het volgende geschreven: Dag Rachid, We zijn dit momenteel nog intern aan het bespreken, aangezien we al een redelijk aandeel hebben van de Marokkaanse markt, moeten we eerst zeker zijn dat we geen van ons ander cliënteel hiermee in moeilijkheden brengen. Het zou ook mogelijk zijn dat ons Dubai office dit zal overnemen aangezien het om de Marokkaanse gaat, (mail verkeer zal dan in het Engels zijn). Hopelijk kunnen we u vandaag nog verder helpen. Vriendelijke groeten Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Rachid | Etnodis [rachid@etnodis.com] Sent: 26/03/2024 13:45 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: Frieten export Dag Emiel, Ik zou graag een eerste bestelling willen maken. Wanneer denkt u de prijzen te kunnen doorsturen? Groet, Rachid Op 25 mrt 2024, om 16:53 heeft Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> het volgende geschreven: Beste, Aangezien dat dit om de Marokkaanse markt gaat, zal ik de prijzen eerst verder moeten bespreken met onze specialist voor Marokko. Ik laat het u weten eenmaal ik antwoord heb van onze specialist. Vriendelijke groeten, Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Rachid | Etnodis [rachid@etnodis.com] Sent: 25/03/2024 16:16 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: Frieten export Kan je jouw prijs aub ook baseren op deze volumes aub. Wat is jullie bestel lever schema? Op 25 mrt 2024, om 16:12 heeft Rachid | Etnodis <rachid@etnodis.com> het volgende geschreven: Wij zijn distributeur. Wij leveren aan de distributie in Marokko. Onze klanten in Marokko zijn mijn collega’s Etnodis Afrika, zij distribueren verder naar retail en Foodservice. Wij hebben een estimatie op 1000ton per jaar. Opbouwend. Op 25 mrt 2024, om 15:55 heeft Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> het volgende geschreven: Beste, Bedankt voor de mail terug. Voor ik u de prijzen van de kroketten kan doorsturen, moet ik u eerst kunnen converteren naar het nieuwe sales systeem. Hiervoor heb ik nog een beetje informatie nodig: * Kan je mij meer vertellen over uw bedrijf? (bent u een distributeur, groothandel, ...) * Wie zijn uw klanten? * Wat volumes verwacht u te doen over een periode van 1 jaar? Met vriendelijke groeten, Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Rachid | Etnodis [rachid@etnodis.com] Sent: 25/03/2024 15:46 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: Frieten export Dankjewel voor de prijzen. Heb je ook prijzen van aardappel kroketten? Dan maak ik de bestelling op. Groet, Rachid Op 25 mrt 2024, om 09:15 heeft Agristo Sales <Sales@agristo.com> het volgende geschreven: Beste, Bedankt voor de mail en de interesse in ons bedrijf. Zou je de hoeveelheid kunnen specificeren? Om een idee te geven van de momentele prijzen, heb ik ook een prijsboekje aan deze mail gebonden. Vriendelijke groeten Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Rachid | Etnodis [rachid@etnodis.com] Sent: 21/03/2024 15:32 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: Frieten export Beste, Ik zou een 10tal platten frieten willen bestellen van de 9x9 Het is al even geleden, kan u mij uw beste prijs doorsturen aub? Onze gegevens zijn ook gewijzigd, zie pdf hieronder: Met vriendelijke groeten Rachid [ Coordinates.pdf (application/pdf) ] Op 12 apr 2023, om 12:23 heeft Agristo Sales <Sales@agristo.com> het volgende geschreven: Dag Rachid, 16.30h lukt ook voor ons! Ik zal u een uitnodiging sturen. Met vriendelijke groeten, Axelle <image001.png> Axelle Van Maldeghem Student ............................................................................................... Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9, B-8710 Wielsbeke, Belgium P +32 56 54 09 00 Axelle.VanMaldeghem@agristo.com<mailto:Axelle.VanMaldeghem@agristo.com> www.agristo.com [Jobdagen 30/03 & 01/04 Wielsbeke & Nazareth]<https://www.jobdag.agristo.com/>

Subject: Sv: [EXTERN] FW: ESBFD-JK430 Transportbokning 10198382 order E198564001
TextBody: Good day, Apologies for the late reply, but we were in lunch and in meetings. When you have problems with loadings, it is best to include the loading place of Wielsbeke themselves: email: aw_expeditie@agristo.com phone: +32 56 54 09 16 If urgent, it is better to phone some one. Should you not be helped by the loading place, Dagab (or in extremis DSV yourself) can call me on my phone in the signature (or mobile: +32 165.248) I also want to note it is best that the driver goes to the reception, there are some bosses/ loading responsibles. I have the feeling the driver only asked in the warehouse self at several loading people, but better is to go to the reception if the person loading the driver's truck does not seem to help and take it up with the loading responsibles. I had a call with Lasse now and he informed me he was indeed only waiting for the final confiration of someone at Dagab that the driver may leave, which is happened now :)

Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, <H>Hiermit erhalten Sie im Anhang Ihre Belege.</> Hinweis: Bitte beachten Sie, dass diese Emailadresse lediglich dem automatisierten Versand von Emails dient. Daher werden Sie keine Antwort erhalten, wenn Sie diese Adresse kontaktieren. Bei Fragen zu bestimmten Belegen beachten Sie bitte folgende Hinweise: <H>Konditionsabrechnungsbelege </> Bitte wenden Sie sich bei Fragen zu Reklamationsanzeigen, auf die sich dieses Dokument bezieht (2er-Nummern im Kasten), immer an den Aussteller der jeweiligen Belege. Diese werden Ihnen gesondert zugestellt. Sollten Sie Fragen zu den Konditionen haben, wenden Sie sich an konditionen@edeka.de. <H>Reklamationsanzeigen</> Bitte wenden Sie sich bei Fragen zu diesen Reklamationsanzeigen immer an den jeweiligen Aussteller. Die Kontaktdaten finden Sie oben rechts. <H>Rückbuchungen bzgl. fehlerhafter GLN </> Bitte wenden Sie sich an zr.stammdaten@edeka.de. <H>Rückbuchungen mit anderen Gründen </> Bitte wenden Sie sich bei Fragen zur Rückbuchung an den auf dem Beleg angegebenen Ansprechpartner. <H>NVG-Belege</> Bitte wenden Sie sich bei Fragen zu diesen Belegen immer an den Aussteller. Die Kontaktdaten finden Sie im Kopfteil dieses Belegs. <H>Wenn Ihnen Belege fehlen, wenden Sie sich bitte immer an beleganforderung@edeka.de</> <H>Sollten Sie keinen Ansprechpartner auf den Anhängen finden oder einen Zustellfehler als Antwort erhalten, kontaktieren Sie gern zr.stammdaten@edeka.de.</> <H>Bei Anfragen zu den einzelnen Themen schicken Sie bitte immer den oder die Belege mit, zu denen Sie Fragen haben</> . Dear Sir or Madam <H>Please find attached your receipts</> Please note that this email address is only used for automated sending of emails. Therefore, you will not receive a reply if you contact this address. If you have any questions regarding specific receipts, please note the following: <H>Condition settlement documents</> Please always contact the issuer of the respective receipts with any questions regarding complaint notices to which this document refers (2- numbers in the box). These will be sent to you separately. If you have any questions regarding the terms and conditions, please contact konditionen@edeka.de. <H>Complaint notices</> Please always contact the respective exhibitor if you have any questions regarding these complaint notices. You will find the contact details at the top right. <H>Chargebacks regarding incorrect GLN</> Please contact zr.stammdaten@edeka.de. <H>Chargebacks with other reasons</> Please contact the person indicated on the receipt with any questions regarding chargebacks. <H>NVG-Receipts</> Please always contact the issuer with any questions regarding these receipts. The contact details can be found in the header of this document. If you are missing any documents please always contact beleganforderung@edeka.de <H>If you do not find a contact person on the attachments or receive a delivery error as a response, feel free to contact zr.stammdaten@edeka.de</> <H>When making inquiries about individual topics, please always include the document(s) you have questions about</> Vielen Dank. Thank you. Mit freundlichen Grüßen

TextBody: Bonjour, J'ai reçue vos données de Mme Delobel d'Auchan. Pour mettre tout correcte dans notre système et être certain de bien et correctement pouvoir recevoir vos commandes, on aimerait vous demander d'envoyer une commande teste par EDI ou un format txt. Pourriez-vous nous envoyer une commande teste, pour Amiens 2 Surgelé - XPO SAINGHIN, et livraison à XPO LOGISTICS SAINGHIN / CRT 3 - 511/589 Rue des Seringats 59262 SAINGHIN EN MELANTOIS? Auchan nous avait donné un excel, je pense avoir selectionnées tout les dépots STEF ici-inclus. Ou avez-vous vous même un document ou résumé avec vos dépots et leur GLN? Subject: RE: Certificado de plásticos - Delegaciones
TextBody: --------------- Forwarded Message --------------- From: Service Request [service@agristo.com] Sent: 5/04/2024 14:26 To: info@delegacionescanarias.com Cc: Melissa.Seynaeve@agristo.com; Els.Beernaert@agristo.com; Elynn.Marisse@agristo.com Subject: RE: Certificado de plásticos - Delegaciones Hola Jessica, Como acordado por teléfono, Elynn parará de momento enviar el documento/ certificado de plástico adicional hasta uno o todos los clientes mencionen que tengan problemas. Los datos del plástico NO reciclado están mencionados en la factura y el albarán. Si en el futuro hace falta el certificado de plástico, podría verificar si: podríamos hacer 1 certificado por cliente por año? Si el certificado tiene que ser firmado? (solo veo en el boletin algo sobre la firma para plasticos reciclados, no para platico no recilado) Un saludo cordial, Mercedes D'hoker Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 63 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Mercedes D'hoker [mercedes.dhoker@agristo.com] Sent: 28/03/2024 14:49 To: info@delegacionescanarias.com Cc: Elynn.Marisse@agristo.com; Els.Beernaert@agristo.com; Melissa.Seynaeve@agristo.com Subject: RE: Certificado de plásticos - Delegaciones Buenas tardes, Para evitar el trabajo manual adicional que Elynn en ese momente debe hacer para cada carga, querríamos verificar alugnas cosas: Aun hace falta el certificado adicional? Si leo todo de nuevo, era necesario sobre todo para el plástico reciclado, no parece necesario para el plástico no reciclado. Estoy correcta? Como nosotros solo temenos plástico NO reciclado, se podría omitier el certificado adicional? En ese momento la cantidad de plastico esta mencionada en cada albarán y factura (y no está firmado) Si me equivoco y el certificado adicional es necesario, podríamos hacer 1 certificado por cliente por año? Si aun necesita el certificado, tiene que ser firmado? (solo veo en el boletin algo sobre la firma para plasticos reciclados, no para platico no recilado) Un saludo cordial, Mercedes​​​​ D'hoker Customer Service Specialist T +32 56 54 11 63 • M +32 498 16 52 48 Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 • 8710 Wielsbeke • Belgium • www.agristo.com

Subject: FED24216
TextBody: Hi Jean-Louis, Onze excuses hiervoor. Ik pas de range aan zodat Mareco opnieuw kan inboeken. Mvg, Elynn Marisse Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 472 922 248 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Jean-Louis Demuynck | Fedeco [jeanlouis.demuynck@fedeco.eu] Sent: 5/04/2024 13:55 To: shipping@fedeco.eu; service@agristo.com Subject: Re: FED24216 - URGENT Dag Elynn We zullen als volgt moeten doen: Laden op maandag 15/04. Kan je aub terug open zetten voor Mareco. Het komt wel echt heel slecht uit want deze afvaart is nog eens met 11 dagen extra. Dat komt neer op een totale vertraging van 18 dagen. Ik denk dat we een week gaan moeten opschuiven… hou u op de hoogte. Productierun is verlaat naar 8/4 en we ontbreken nog 10 pallets voor dit order. Idealiter zou laden 10/4 nog beter zijn mochten er dit weekend nog eventuele vertragingen zijn. Kunnen jullie even bekijken met jullie transporteur of het mogelijk zou zijn om 9/4 late namiddag of nog beter 10/4 te laden? Orderbevestiging in bijlage. We kunnen laden in week 14. Pick up address: NL, 5047 SX, Tilburg, Heieinde 10 [https://www.survey-xact.dk/images/uploaded/XHPV87483J32]<https://www.survey-xact.dk/answer?key=8LVJ6AG38L1P> Deadline for your goods ready confirmation: Pick up address in Denmark: Deadline 1 working day prior to handover date before 12.00 PM CET Pick up address outside Denmark: Deadline 2 working days prior to handover date before 2.00 PM CET For questions to goods ready confirmations contact order_ready@coop.dk. NB! The following national holidays in Denmark will affect your deadline for returning the Goods Ready confirmation: Pick up outside DK: National Holiday 28/3 and 29/3 and 1/4: Pick up Tuesday 2/4 - Deadline Tuesday 26/3 before 2.00 PM CET Pick up Wednesday 3/4 - Deadline Wednesday 27/3 before 2.00 PM CET National Holiday 9/5: Pick up Friday 10/5 - Deadline Tuesday 7/5 before 2.00 PM CET National Holiday 20/5: Pick up Tuesday 21/5 - Deadline Thursday 16/5 before 2.00 PM CET Pick up in DK: National Holiday 28/3 and 29/3 and 1/4: Pick up Tuesday 2/4 - Deadline Wednesday 27/3 before 12.00 PM CET National Holiday 9/5: Pick up Friday 10/5 - Deadline Wednesday 8/5 before 12.00 PM CET National Holiday 20/5: Pick up Tuesday 21/5 - Deadline Friday 17/5 before 12.00 PM CET If the order contains dangerous goods, the necessay documents and UN number(s) must be sent to the carrier or transport@coop.dk. Thank you for your help! Coop Transport, Goods Ready https://transport.coop.dk/answer?key=8LVJ6AG38L1P

Subject: Agristo 309 Purchase Order
TextBody: Hi Elynn, good morning😊 I am attaching our purchase order # 1810, representing Agristo 309, which is schedule to sail onboard the vessel, CMA-CGM America, on Thursday, April 18th, 2024, and arrive in Kingston, Jamaica on Monday, May 6th , 2024 . We would appreciate if you would send us your order confirmation, confirming shipping details, also, a draft copy or copies, of the EUR.1 Certificates for our review, at your earliest convenience. Just a reminder to remove any mention of Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

Subject: Amon Distribution - Agristo
TextBody: Cher Emiel, Merci pour votre retour. Voici mes réponses : * Vendez-vous actuellement des frites congelées? Qui sont vos fournisseurs actuels ? Non pour le moment je n'ai vendu aucune frite. Je suis a la recherche d'un fournisseur de confiance et avec qui on pourra travailler sur le long terme. * Quel volume vendez-vous mensuellement? Je prévois de vendre 90 Tonnes minimum. * Quel est votre canal de vente ? Qui sont vos clients/marchées ? En direct avec les grossistes. * Quels produits spécifiques souhaitez-vous acheter chez nous? Les frites surgelées 6/6 et 9/9 en pré-salée. * Est-ce que vous avez un site web ? Non pas pour le moment, car on n'en trouve pas l'utilité. J'ai effectivement quelque question ; * Quelles sont les possibilités de personnalisation ? * Quels sont vos délais de livraison ? * Serait Il possible d'avoir un catalogue de vos produit * Avez-vous vos propre transporteur ou il faut qu'on achemine nos camions jusqu'à votre usine * Quels sont vos prix ? * Quel est le volume de chaque paquet 2,5kg ? ou 1,5kg ? Bien à vous Respectueusement, Yilmaz-Yavuz Muslum CEO AMON DISTRIBUTION 0751839001 Le ven. 5 avr. 2024 à 09:11, Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com<mailto:sales@agristo.com>> a écrit : Cher, Nous apprécions votre intérêt pour notre société. Pouvez-vous nous fournir plus d’informations concernant votre business? * Vendez-vous actuellement des frites congelées? Qui sont vos fournisseurs actuels ? * Quel volume vendez-vous mensuellement? * Quel est votre canal de vente ? Qui sont vos clients/marchées ? * Quels produits spécifiques souhaitez-vous acheter chez nous? * Est-ce que vous avez un site web ? S'il vous plaît n'hésitez pas à me contacter si vous avez des questions. Avec mes meilleures salutations, Emiel Vanwynsberghe

Subject: RE: Votre Référencement chez Auchan
TextBody: Bonjour, concernant les facturations (NAD+IV) Auchan, si il y a 2 gln différent c’est parce que AUCHAN est séparé en deux parties, une partie pour les magasins HYPERMARCHE et une partie pour les SUPERMARCHE, donc en fonction de l’endroit ou sera acheté votre marchandise, la facturation est différente (mais elle est rappelée dans les fichiers que nous allons vous envoyer). Je vous ai parlé d’une migration au téléphone, cette migration a justement pour BUT de réunir ces deux entités en une seule. Mais pour le moment nous allons devoir fonctionner comme cela au début. Je vous remets en pièce jointe les documents concernant notre EDI toute la relation tripartie est expliquée dedans. Si vous avez des questions n’hésitez pas. Bien Cordialement Robin Cordialement,

Subject: Export Cuba
TextBody: Beste Ferine, Hartelijk dank voor het bezoek en het fijn gesprek! In de bijlage kunt u de prijslijst terug vinden van de momentele prijzen voor de gevraagde producten. Als ook de technische fiches voor deze producten, zowel voor de A-grade als de B-grade producten. Indien u nog vragen heeft stel ze zeker, en ik help u graag verder. Vriendelijke groeten, Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Directora - Comin Caribe [directora@comincaribe.com] Sent: 29/03/2024 16:32 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: Export Cuba Beste Emiel, Om 13u is het voor ons ook OK Plannen we in? Alvast bedankt Mvg, Ferine Sent from my iPhone On 29 Mar 2024, at 11:06, Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> wrote: ﻿ Beste Ferine, Zou het mogelijk zijn om deze meeting op een ander moment te doen? 11u zal moeilijk worden wegens een voorafgaande meeting. Ik ben beschikbaar om 9u30 of vanaf 13u tot 16u ben ik ook nog vrij. Hopelijk past dit nog binnen uw agenda. Indien er iets onduidelijk is of je hebt nog vragen over de meeting, laat het mij zeker weten en ik beantwoordt uw vragen met plezier. Vriendelijke groeten, Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Directora - Comin Caribe [directora@comincaribe.com] Sent: 28/03/2024 23:11 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: Export Cuba Beste Emiel, Is het mogelijk elkaar te ontmoeten op 5 april om 11u? Subject: Agristo 310 Purchase Order
TextBody: Hi Elynn, good morning😊 I am attaching our purchase order # 1811, representing Agristo 310, which is schedule to sail onboard the vessel, CMA-CGM Fort Royal, on Thursday, April 25th, 2024, and arrive in Kingston, Jamaica on Monday, May 13th , 2024 . We would appreciate if you would send us your order confirmation, confirming shipping details, also, a draft copy or copies, of the EUR.1 Certificates for our review, at your earliest convenience. Just a reminder to remove any mention of the word Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

Subject: FrenchFries //commercial PromptMeat
TextBody: Dear Ardit, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: DAGAB/ Agristo/ loading agreements
TextBody: Good day, The loading place informed me, there are currently quite often discussion and requests to reload/ reorganize the loading of the pallets. As I had Lasse from DSV on the phone today, he explained this is probably due to to overweight on axels. I was wondering if you could speak and look with DSV whether you can figure out a way to take into account the division and order in which you send through the pallets for each article on the order, so that we load correctly from the start and can avoid overweight on the axels. To help you, I send you attached the pallet weight per product/ article. Should you not understand what I mean or need my help to set up a flow in which we can immediatly enter the orders in such a way that pallets are nicely divided (weihtwise), just le me know and we can schedule an online call (if necessary along with DSV). Until we have this set up, may I ask that drivers are informed we look at the comments in TMS, and try to help them if they request to reload, but please to maintain calm and understand it is easier if they communite as soon as they see something might be wrong.

Subject: New POs. 00415 to 00416/24 - COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA
TextBody: Dear friends, Please find attached: • - P.O. 00415 e 416/24 - 2 x 40' fcl - FOB ANTUERPIA + PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Shipment WEEK 16 (15/04 - 21/04/24 ) Please send us PROFORMA INVOICE for approval. Note below important details: • It’s mandatory to place some cartons per item and per lot near the container door for inspection purposes. • If it’s a container reefer, it’s mandatory to have at least 1 thermographs (monitors SENSITECH), next to the container door. It must be programmed to register 120 days. • Send the shipping advice/report including information and photos of loading in order to check the condition of the goods and container before loaded. • Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. Please follow the below instructions for shipping documents: INVOICE / PROFORMA BUYER / IMPORTED BY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY/ADQUIRENTE PAGADOR: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 There is some mandatory information to be mentioned on INVOICE/PROFORMA: • Detailed Description of Goods in Portuguese and English: • Full Producer details: • Country of Origin, Shipment and Purchase: • Total Net Quantity: • Total Gross Quantity: • NCM code – only the 4 first digits • Payment Terms: 60 DD • Loading Port: ANTUERPIA • Unloading Port: PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Incoterm: FOB • Exporter Bank Details • Must be always stamped and signed by hand by AGRISTO N.V. • It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. Only to be added on INVOICE: • Production's date: DD/MM/YYYY • Expiry's date: DD/MM/YYYY • Lot Number: • If importer has a Purchase Order No. (reference no.) please include it. • Date of Invoice must be before or the same as date mentioned in the bill of landing; • It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. • The freight rates mentioned in Purchases Orders and Proformas are an estimated freight. In the original invoice, mention the freight exactly as it appears in the Bill of Landing. BILL OF LANDING - OBS: Report FREE-TIME and perdiem. CONSIGNEE: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 • NCM code – only the 4 first digits • Include CBM (m³) in the B/L. • On the fields Consignee and Notify, please DON’T use the sentence "TO THE ORDER OF". • It must inform the existence or not of wooden package. • Include the thermograph number in B/L. • Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. • Issue 3 set of B/L and one might be used for the bank, one might be used to send to the consignee, one might be kept with the shipper, for safety reasons, as it is not necessary to release the load. PACKING LIST Must be always stamped and signed by AGRISTO N.V. BUYER / IMPORTED BY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY/ADQUIRENTE PAGADOR: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN/ ANALYSIS / ANALYSIS MICROBIOLOGICAL / LOT DECLARATION + OTHER CERTIFICATES • Analysis – Always with the same date as BL, or before. THOSE DOCUMENTS MUST BE ISSUED ONLY IN NAME OF: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 All documents must be sent to us by e-mail for approval, before sending the originals. Please do not issue any original without our approval. It is very important to send all originals of shipping documents before the arrival of the vessel, the originals must be on this side at least 5 days before ETA, in order to avoid unnecessary storage expenses and/or penalty fees due to delay of sending originals. Collection letter to the bank must be made in name of COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 Send to below bank address: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL

Subject: New POs. 00424 to 00428/24 - COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA
TextBody: Dear friends, Please find attached: - P.O. 00424 to 428/24 - 5 x 40' fcl - (produto) - FOB - Shipment WEEK 16 (15/04 - 21/04/24 ) - POD: PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL Please send us PROFORMA INVOICE for approval. Note below important details: • It’s mandatory to place some cartons per item and per lot near the container door for inspection purposes. • If it’s a container reefer, it’s mandatory to have at least 1 thermographs (monitors SENSITECH), next to the container door. It must be programmed to register 120 days. • Send the shipping advice/report including information and photos of loading in order to check the condition of the goods and container before loaded. • Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. Please follow the below instructions for shipping documents: INVOICE / PROFORMA BUYER / IMPORTED BY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY/ADQUIRENTE PAGADOR: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 There is some mandatory information to be mentioned on INVOICE/PROFORMA: • Detailed Description of Goods in Portuguese and English: • Full Producer details: • Country of Origin, Shipment and Purchase: • Total Net Quantity: • Total Gross Quantity: • NCM code – only the 4 first digits • Payment Terms: 60 DD • Loading Port: ANTUERPIA • Unloading Port: PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Incoterm: FOB • Exporter Bank Details • Must be always stamped and signed by hand by AGRISTO N.V. • It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. Only to be added on INVOICE: • Production's date: DD/MM/YYYY • Expiry's date: DD/MM/YYYY • Lot Number: • If importer has a Purchase Order No. (reference no.) please include it. • Date of Invoice must be before or the same as date mentioned in the bill of landing; • It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. • The freight rates mentioned in Purchases Orders and Proformas are an estimated freight. In the original invoice, mention the freight exactly as it appears in the Bill of Landing. BILL OF LANDING - OBS: Report FREE-TIME and perdiem. CONSIGNEE: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 • NCM code – only the 4 first digits • Include CBM (m³) in the B/L. • On the fields Consignee and Notify, please DON’T use the sentence "TO THE ORDER OF". • It must inform the existence or not of wooden package. • Include the thermograph number in B/L. • Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. • Issue 3 set of B/L and one might be used for the bank, one might be used to send to the consignee, one might be kept with the shipper, for safety reasons, as it is not necessary to release the load. PACKING LIST Must be always stamped and signed by AGRISTO N.V. BUYER / IMPORTED BY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY/ADQUIRENTE PAGADOR: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN/ ANALYSIS / ANALYSIS MICROBIOLOGICAL / LOT DECLARATION + OTHER CERTIFICATES • Analysis – Always with the same date as BL, or before. THOSE DOCUMENTS MUST BE ISSUED ONLY IN NAME OF: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 All documents must be sent to us by e-mail for approval, before sending the originals. Please do not issue any original without our approval. It is very important to send all originals of shipping documents before the arrival of the vessel, the originals must be on this side at least 5 days before ETA, in order to avoid unnecessary storage expenses and/or penalty fees due to delay of sending originals. Collection letter to the bank must be made in name of COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 Send to below bank address: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL
